definition: to be dedicated to one's work/to respect one's work
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
diligent and sociable (idiom); meticulous in work and dealing cheerfully with one's colleagues

sentences.english: There are be professional spirit and troop cooperate spirit, 30 years old about.
sentences.chinese: 有敬業精神和團隊協作精神，30歲左右。

sentences.english: Facing the solemn duty badge, we will love the job.
sentences.chinese: 面對莊嚴的稅徽，我們要愛崗敬業。

sentences.english: We will bring the same kind of openness, passion, dedication and professionalism to Liverpool FC.
sentences.chinese: 我們會把開放，熱情，奉獻和敬業的精神帶給利物浦。

sentences.english: High sense of work responsibility and devotedness.
sentences.chinese: 高度的工作責任心和敬業精神。

sentences.english: Employees trust the company so they pool their wisdom and efforts into the company.
sentences.chinese: 羣策羣力，敬業樂羣是員工對公司的信賴。

sentences.english: The central character is a likeable and dedicated policeman with a dry sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 主人公是一位可愛而又敬業的警察，經常缺少幽默感。

sentences.english: Abide by work ethics, love children and this job.
sentences.chinese: 認真遵守職業道德，熱愛幼兒，敬業愛崗。

sentences.english: And have the stronger and respect-work spirit and teams to help to make the spirit.
sentences.chinese: 且具有較強的敬業精神和團隊協作精神。

sentences.english: With good working attitude and teamwork spirit.
sentences.chinese: 很好的敬業和團隊合作精神。

sentences.english: Skilled employees, love and respect their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 企業員工技術熟練，愛崗敬業。

sentences.english: Treat people sincerely, work initiative seriously, full of professionalism.
sentences.chinese: 待人誠懇，工作主動認真，富有敬業精神。

sentences.english: You must greet new clients with polite professionalism.
sentences.chinese: 凡有新顧客，你都得做到敬業周到。

sentences.english: The courage and professionalism of our armed forces are second to none.
sentences.chinese: 我軍的勇氣和敬業精神是世界上首屈一指的。

sentences.english: BUYER shall manage the consignment stock with the care proper to a respectable businessman.
sentences.chinese: 買方應本着敬業的原則妥善管理寄售庫存商品。

sentences.english: Love this job and keep improving to be both a planner and a translator.
sentences.chinese: 積極的敬業愛崗，提高專業素養，成爲策劃型翻譯。

sentences.english: I appreciate very much the genuine interest shown from all people involved in the factory.
sentences.chinese: 我非常欣賞陶坊所有的工作人員，他們都非常的敬業。

definition: to work hard/to do one's very best/to throw oneself into the task at hand
well qualified/competent/to be equal to the task/able to do sth very well
conscientious/earnest/serious/to take seriously/to take to heart
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
